createRuleContext.SERVICE_NAME:
INSERT INTO rule_context(context_name,rule, rule_group)
select *
from (
Select concat(c.ActivityName, '(' , b.PhaseName ,'-',a.MethodologyName , ')') as context_name, concat('Activity == "',ActivityCode,'"') as rule, ActivityCode
From Methodology a
, Phase b
, Activity c
Where a.MethodologyCode = b.MethodologyCode
And b.PhaseCode = c.PhaseCode
And ActivityCode Not in (Select rule_group From rule_context Where kind = ?)
Order By a.MethodologyCode, b.PhaseCode , c.ActivitySeq
) a
where a.context_name not in (Select context_name from rule_context where parent_seq = -1)
